summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of TechNexus India website. All major sections, responsive design, and most interactive elements working correctly. Minor issues with form dropdown selections.

ui_bugs.issue: Service dropdown selection has stability issues during click interaction
ui_bugs.symptoms: Element not stable during click, timeout errors

ui_bugs.issue: Time slot selection has timeout issues when clicking options
ui_bugs.symptoms: Timeout when selecting time slot options

passed_tests: All 6 main sections present and functional
Form validation (error messages for empty fields)
Services section (5 cards with hover effects)
Why Choose Us section (6 benefit cards)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown selection issues in both BookNowForm and ScheduleCallForm. The shadcn/ui Select components may need force:true clicks or different interaction approach to handle the animation timing properly.
